title: How to Lighten Your Hair in the Sun

steps.title: Get the things you'll need.
steps.content: Get the things you'll need. (List below)

steps.title: First, be sure to cut ONE lemon and ONE lime in half.
steps.content: First, be sure to cut ONE lemon and ONE lime in half.

steps.title: If you have a juicer, this step is much easier.
steps.content: If you have a juicer, this step is much easier. Now you're going to squeeze the lemon and the lime in the juicer, till you have approximately one cup of lemon-lime juice.

steps.title: Prepare a spray bottle (preferably a "mister") and fill it with the one cup of lemon-lime juice, and one cup of warm water.
steps.content: Prepare a spray bottle (preferably a "mister") and fill it with the one cup of lemon-lime juice, and one cup of warm water.

steps.title: Spritz this mixture all over your DRY hair, until your hair is completely damp with it.
steps.content: Spritz this mixture all over your DRY hair, until your hair is completely damp with it.

steps.title: Go outside on a warm and sunny day, and sit out in the sun until your hair is completely dry.
steps.content: Go outside on a warm and sunny day, and sit out in the sun until your hair is completely dry.

steps.title: Shampoo and condition your hair after it is dry, and style as usual.
steps.content: Shampoo and condition your hair after it is dry, and style as usual.
